Module.Name: Grove 3mm Purple LED
Module.Overview: The Grove Purple LED (3mm) is a purple LED twig.

Register.Name: duty_cycle
Register.Description: This register specifes the on duty cycle as a percentage value between 0 and 100. 0 means totally off and 100 means totally on.

Register.Name: frequency
Register.Description: This register specifes the refresh frequency in Hertz (cycles per second) as a value between 1 and 1000. A frequency value of 0 means the LED is off. A value of 1 means the LED is cycled at 1 Hertz. A value of 1000 means the LED is cycled at 1000 Hertz.
